channel.title: Port Fowarding Help Please
channel.description:
Well, I need some help on port fowarding for my server. I already have a register ip on no-ip.com (Dragon-Pkz.no-ip.biz). I was told to open CMD box and type ipconfig, and then put the LAN ip address in the address bar in your browers address line. I did, and this is what popped up.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/34ef8kx.jpg[/img]
Now after I typed the LAN ip address in the address bar in my browser I was told to go to "Applications and Gaming", but I can't find it anywhere. Please help with this.

item.title: Port Fowarding Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Arcane_Mage Arcane Mage
item.description:
@Arcane_Mage wrote:

I dont see anywhere where it gives me simple instrcutions on how to Port Foward. I have choosen the router that I have, and it is saying stuff about “PFConfig” and saying to buy it and they will automaticly Port Foward it for you for $29.95. Please help with further instructions?

Read full topic

item.title: Port Fowarding Help Please
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

:mad:, www.portforward.com, find your Router then select RuneScape Private Servers at the bottom, and it will tell you how to Portforward correctly useing your Router.

Read full topic
